Summary: 4 moved across sky at different paces and one was low enough to see well. No sound from any of the crafts.
trends: There have been 12 other sightings in Clarksville
There were no other sightings in Clarksville on or around January 6th 2010
divs: Sighting DetailsMe and a friend were standing outside when he noticed a star that appeared to be moving. When I looked up it was about three. Then, we looked over and saw one that low flying. It was not blinking at first, then it started to mimick an airplane with flashing lights. Yet no sound was heard. There were many witnesses to the event. Wish I had a camcorder!! :( It was a great moment. WE'RE NOT ALONE!!!!
